title: This not your Apollo moon buggy. NASA wants a new moon rover.
description: The “Lunar Terrain Vehicle” would play a key role in NASA’s plan to create the infrastructure that would allow a long-term human presence on the moon.

title: Detecting AI may be impossible. That’s a big problem for teachers.
description: Turnitin has acknowledged a reliability problem with Ai cheating-detection software used on 38 million student papers.

title: What the Amazon Alexa settlement means for parents and kids
description: Here is what parents need to know about protecting their children’s privacy when it comes to using voice assistants.

title: ChatGPT took their jobs. Now they walk dogs and fix air conditioners.
description: Meet the people who have already lost their jobs to AI.

title: Russia says thousands of iPhones were hacked, blames U.S. and Apple
description: Russian cybersecurity company Kaspersky Lab said the campaign had implanted file-stealing malware on iPhones running a year-old version of Apple’s mobile operating system but that it didn't have data to blame anyone.
